fields.value: Supplementary data for 'Chapter 4: Sulfur cycling, an important process in the formation of the Anarraaq barite body and Zn-Pb-Ag deposit, Red Dog district, Alaska: a SIMS study of barite (δ34S and δ18O), pyrite and marcasite (δ34S)'

dsDescriptionValue.value:
Supplementary file associated with PhD thesis Chapter 4 - Sulfur cycling, an important process in the formation of the Anarraaq barite body and Zn-Pb-Ag deposit, Red Dog district, Alaska: a SIMS study of barite (δ34S and δ18O), pyrite and marcasite (δ34S). This includes one data table.

Table. S4.1: SIMS data for pyrite, marcasite, and barite in the Anarraaq barite body and sulfide deposit.

publicationCitation.value: Reynolds, MA (2019) Genesis of sediment-hosted Zn-Pb-Ag mineralization in the Red Dog district, Alaska, USA. PhD Thesis, University of Alberta, Edmonton. https://doi.org/10.7939/r3-mmsk-9x89

files.description: Table S4.1: SIMS data for pyrite, marcasite, and barite in the Anarraaq barite body and sulfide deposit.
files.label: Reynolds (2019) Table S4.tab

dataFile.description: Table S4.1: SIMS data for pyrite, marcasite, and barite in the Anarraaq barite body and sulfide deposit.
